Html:
Hi
i am working on project which capture speaker audio data with help of naudio. i add naudio DLL to my project and its working fine. my question is the same DLL work on window 8 ? when i add naudio from nuget it add two DLL to my project one is naudio and one is for window 8 . Should i use both or only naudio.dll.

Thanks
are you building a windows store app?

Hi markheath
No I m building a console app it might be used on window 8 machine.
so, just use the regular NAudio library. The other one is just for Windows Store applications and is much more limited in what it can do.
